title: Marketplace Tech for Wednesday, April 15, 2015
byline: Adrienne Hill, Molly Wood and Aparna Alluri
description: Airing on Wednesday, April 15, 2015: First up, we talk to Carissa Christensen, managing partner at the Tauri Group, about the Space X launching and landing. Next, Marketplace’s Molly Wood explains why the Apple Watch is a beta version of smartwatches to come. We'll also talk to Walter Woodman, co-director of the short film Noah, about the challenges of directing a movie where every scene unfolds on a computer screen.
